Najah::

Najah saw Teltoli left the place and say himself "I know at whom I'll 
hurt"


Changed to Robot ms, showed his rockest and Fo0llow Teltoli


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, steph_teltoli@m... wrote:
> Teltoli SilverWing fired back at GodFather with another missile, 
and 
> watched it streak towards him. Her arm trembled as she listened to 
> screams of pain, missile blasts and fireball hisses. She would cry 
if 
> she could, but bots didn't have tear ducts.
> 
> How could she live with this war? She couldn't! She wasn't designed 
> for war, and she hated it! Bots did this to each other all the 
time? 
> No..
> 
> She gasped in horror, and dropped her weapon, taking a step back. 
She 
> was doomed to live with this all her life?
> 
> Not if she could help it, she wasn't going to live like this. 
Teltoli 
> put on her cloaking, and flew up into the air, undetected and 
unseen. 
> She gave WindLord one last look, closed her eyes briefly, and flew 
> away. Flew away from the battle, the pain, and the Maximals.
> 
> "I'm sorry.." She whispered, her back turned from the slaughter.
